attributes.background: We would like you to reopen the HMV in Southport even if it isn't big because all the anime fans, kpop fans, alternative kids etc don't have anywhere to buy there music or merch and we don't want to go all the way to Liverpool .

rejection.details:
This is a matter for HMV as a private business, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise the issue with your local MP and ask if they would speak to HMV on your behalf, if that is something you'd like them to do. You can find your MP's contact details by entering your post code here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP.
